attributes.name: accountingObjectDescription
attributes.description: Description: Example: Cost center, profit center, etc.

attributes.name: accountingNo
attributes.description: Accounting split line: if split based on quantity the split line number

attributes.name: distributionPercentage
attributes.description: Percentage distribution: By default it is 100%

attributes.name: distributionQuantity
attributes.description: Quantity distribution: Total split should be equivalent to the quantity being ordered.
